item.title: Dirty Progressive House..nyc winter mix 2011.
item.description: 1.TV ROCK - IN THE AIR (AXWELL REMIX) 2.KELLY ROWLAND FEAT DAVID GUETTA - COMMANDER 3.YOLANDA BE COOL - WE NO SPEAK AMERICANO 4.MILK&SUGAR - VAYA CON DIOS HEY 5.MARIO OCHOA - BIG SPENDER 6.THE CUBE GUYS - IN LOVE 7.EDWARD MAYA - STEREO LOVE 8.STEVE ANGELLO - SHOW ME LOVE REMIX 9.SWEDISH HOUSE MAFIA - ONE 10.DENNIS FERRER - HEY HEY (VANDALISM REMIX) 11.CHRISTIAN FALERO FEAT KELLY DAVIS - PUT EM HIGH 12.STEVE ANGELLO - TIVOLI 13.NADIA ALI - RAPTOR (AVICII REMIX) 14.THOMAS GOLD - AGORA 15.STEVE ANGELLO - KNAS 16.STEVE ANGELLO - RAVE N ROLL 17.VINNY TRIOA FEAT JAIDENE VEDA - DO FOR LOVE 18.ARTHUR DEEP 17MM SHOUTS OUT TO: NYC, USA, SOUTH AMERICA & EUROPE. PEACE AND LOVE....

item.title: Deep House from back in the days DJ Raous
item.description: 1.St. Etienne-Only love can break your heart (MAW MIX). 2.Lil Louis-New Dance Beat. 3.Erick Morillo- Dancin Dub. 4.DJ Raous-I have a dream (Tribute to Martin Luther King). 5.Kerri Chandler- Heal my heart. 6.Mutiny- Bliss. 7.Kimara Lovelace- Misery. 8.Cajmere-Brighter Days (Todd Terry Mix). 9.Hard Drive - Deep Inside. 10.Aly-us- Follow Me. 11.The Believers-Who dares to believe in me. 12.The Bucketheads-Went. 13.CJ Bolland-Sugar Daddy (Armand Van Hel). 14.Michael Watford feat India-Freedom /Voices. 15.Ten City-Deep Kiss. Shouts to all Househeads!Sound Factory Bar heads wed's with Louie Vega! NYC /Zanzabar New Jersey/Shelter NYC Circa late 80's & 90's. Shouts to NYC,NEW Jersey,Chicago,USA,Europe Shouts to DJ Allday, DJ DAkcom and DJ Wayneski... ....

item.title: Old School Classic House 80's and 90's pt2 DJ Raous
item.description: 1.Lil Louis - French Kiss 2.LNR- Work it to the Bone 3.Marshall Jefferson - Move your body 4.Ten City - Devotion 5.Earth People - Dance 6.Lil Louis - Club Lonely 7.3 Generations- Get it off 8.Crystal Waters - Shes Homeless 9.Frankie Knuckles- Whistle Song 10.Bang the party - Bang Bang 11. The Shelter 12. Melissa Morgan - Still in love 13.Revoked - Pieces 14. Ten City - My peace of heaven 15.Todd Terry - Can u Party 16. Ceybil - Love so special 17. Ralphi Rosario- You used to hold me 18. Gypsymen - Hear the Music 19. Classic Bonus Thanks for view and downloading please leave comments

item.title: Classic House 80's and 90's - DJ RAOUS Old School House
item.description: 1.Bobby Konders - The Poem (Dub) 2.Susan Clark - Deeper 3.Robert Ownes - I'll be your friend 4.Underground Solution - Luv Dancin (Roger Sanchez) 5.Jay Willims - Sweat 6.No Smoke - Koro 7.Tyree - Acid Crash 8.Lil Louis - Conversation 9.Raze - Break For Love 10.Sandee - Notice me 11.Seduction- Seduction 12.Earth People - Dance 13.Todd Tery - Bango 14.X - Love the the message (break Dub) 15.Black Sceince Orq- Where were you 16.Ten City Deep Kiss Shouts to all: house heads!! TUNNEL NYC, Sound Factory Bar NYC, The Shelter NYC, Zanzibar NJ, The Garage NYC, and The Warehouse Chicago....
